header.label: OUR TEAM
header.intro: EMOF Teknoloji possesses a disciplined and experienced team structure consisting of engineering, production, quality, and support units. Every employee acts with the goal of production complying with aviation standards.

teams.title: Management & Planning
teams.desc: Team responsible for company strategy, project management, and production planning.

teams.title: Engineering
teams.desc: CNC machining methods, process design, and technical documentation team.

teams.title: Production & Operations
teams.desc: Operation of CNC machines, programming, and field applications.

teams.title: Quality & Certification
teams.desc: Quality management processes in compliance with AS9100 and aviation requirements.

teams.title: Logistics & Warehouse
teams.desc: Material receiving/shipping, stock management, and shipment organization.

teams.title: Support & Admin
teams.desc: Human resources, finance, and administrative operations.
